mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,a.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,a.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jiaoshi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
